text: Renee Amoore R.N. (January 24, 1953 - May 5, 2020) was an American health care activist and politician. She was the founder and president of The Amoore Group, Inc. Amoore was born in Bryn Mawr, Pennsylvania. She was elected to Pennsylvania's Republican State Committee in 1992 and became its deputy chair in 1996. Amoore spoke on the third night of the Republican National Convention on September 3, 2008. Amoore died on May 5, 2020 in Philadelphia, aged 67. ==References== ==Other websites== * Biography Category:1953 births Category:2020 deaths Category:American political activists Category:American physicians Category:Scientists from Philadelphia Category:Politicians from Philadelphia Category:People from Bryn Mawr, Pennsylvania Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
title: Renee Amoore
